Methods to Make Web Pages Bigger

Browser Zoom

The easiest way to make a web page bigger:

  • Press Ctrl + Plus (+) on Windows/Linux
  • Press Command + Plus (+) on Mac
  • Or use Ctrl/Command and mouse wheel up

Text Size Adjustment

Change text size in browser settings:

  • Go to browser settings
  • Find "Font size" or "Text size"
  • Adjust to preferred size

Display Settings

Change system display settings:

  • Windows: Settings → System → Display → Scale
  • Mac: System Preferences → Displays → Resolution

Accessibility Tools

Use built-in accessibility features:

  • Windows Magnifier
  • Mac Zoom
  • Browser extensions for visibility
